description:
Bring accurate error reporting to your bubble app with Sentry. Debug your application and prevent crashes.

Open-source error tracking with full stacktraces & asynchronous context.

✅ Tracks errors in the front-end
✅ Tracks errors in the back-end

To receive special offers and important updates please visit: https://zeroqo.de/updates

NEED HELP BUILDING A CUSTOM APPLICATION?
https://dev.zeroqode.com

SUPERCHARGE YOUR APP WITH ZEROQODE PLUGINS
https://zeroqode.com/plugins

QUESTIONS OR NEED HELP?
https://forum.zeroqode.com
name: Sentry
plugin_instructions:
Using the plugin is very simple. All you need is a (free) Sentry account. Go ahead and sign up at -> https://sentry.io/

1️⃣ Install the plugin and enter your Sentry DSN in the settings.

✅ You're now automatically tracking errors on the frontend.

Now, you can optionally decide to send your own errors to sentry for even more logging.

To do that, use the actions that are available in the plugin:

1️⃣ Capture Server Error

This action lets you send an error to sentry from a backend workflow.

2️⃣ Capture Message

This action lets you send a plain text message to sentry from a page in the frontend.

3️⃣ Capture Error

This action lets you send an error to sentry from a page in the frontend.

✅ That's all there's to it!
